Reviews.Title: Hi-Yo Silver!
Reviews.Author: P. Edward Peters
Reviews.Content: I purchased this laptop for my son's birthday.  I have one happy kid.  :)  My wife and I both have similar, but not identical, Pavilion laptops.  Windows 8 is a bit of a pain, sure, but c'est la vie.  This does come with some of the standard HP bloatware, but a few minutes in the "Add/Remove Programs" section cures most of that.  It's virtually impossible to get another brand with these stats for this money.  An addition to the cool factor is the silver cover, which sets it apart from most other laptops.  It looks like we have another winner in the HP Pavilion family.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: J. Kirby
Reviews.Content: This is a great buy for the price, and I would have given it 5 stars if it had a Linux option.  As soon as I got rid of windows 8.1 the laptop was much better.  Lightweight, good battery life, good hardware, it came a week sooner than I expected, and its perfect for web design.

Reviews.Title: Great machine.
Reviews.Author: Tzvi
Reviews.Content: Very fast, met all my expectations.I only gave it 4 starts because the quick-start guide to setting it up did not give enough instructions for a non-computer expert to set it up, connect Wifi, etc. We had to pay someone to set up the computer for us.
